title: Sterling Holidays Resorts plans to add new hotel every month to cash in on domestic tourism growth
description: Sterling Holidays Resorts Ltd, a part of Thomas Cook India group, plans to add a new hotel every month in the second half of this year to cash in on the robust growth witnessed in domestic tourism, according to a top group official.
